name: Ice Breaks Runner
description:
Ice Breaks Runner : Skate on Ice and Avoid Breaks!
Made in 3 hours total (development time)

Arrow Buttons + WASD for Movement

Submission
Godot Rumble Game Jam #0 
- Theme : Madness Everywhere 
- Link : https://itch.io/jam/godot-rumble

Attribute:

Music : "Quirky Runner" by Eric Matyas soundimage.org
SFX : by Michel Baradari (http://cubeengine.com/forum.php4?action=display_thread&thread_id=2164)
